chunk:
VIKA’S ESSENTIALS VIRGIN PEARLS SERUM

Brand: Vika's Essentials

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Sesame (Sesamum indicum) Oil*, Argan (Argania spinosa) Oil*, Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis)*, Calendula Flowers (Calendula officinalis)*, Olive (Olea europaea) Oil*, Tamanu Nut (Calophyllum inophyllum) Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Sandalwood (Santalum album) Oil*, Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens) Oil*, Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata)

Olive (Olea europaea) Oil*, Tamanu Nut (Calophyllum inophyllum) Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Sandalwood (Santalum album) Oil*, Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens) Oil*, Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) Oil*, * Certified Organic Ingredient

Directions: Shake gently before use. Apply lightly on damp skin to soothe, soften, and nourish for a gorgeous glow!

Warnings: Store in a cool place, use within 6 months.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
